### 🐞 Describe the bug

A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

### 📋 Steps to Reproduce

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. See error

### ✅ Expected behavior

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

### 📸 Screenshots

If applicable, add screenshots.

### 💻 Environment

- OS: [e.g. Windows 11]
- Browser [e.g. Chrome]
- Backend [e.g. Spring Boot 3.2]
- Frontend [e.g. React 18 + Vite]
